channel.title: Themes Guide on Erica Littman
channel.description: Recent content in Themes Guide on Erica Littman

item.title: test
item.description: This is a big title You can add text by just typing things here This is a smaller title The number of # in front of text determines the title size Links and images You can create a hyper link with the following syntax [Text to show](http://your-link.com) This would look like Text to show You can display images in a similar way. All you need to do is place the image in the static/images folder. Then display it by linking to it but adding an !

All you need to do is place the image in the static/images folder. Then display it by linking to it but adding an !
